abstract.para: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "TaxonKey" : [ "is Amsinckia menziesii (Lehm.) A.Nelson & J.F.Macbr." ] } The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 1 records from Auckland Museum Botany Collection 1 records from Herbarium Willing at Herbarium Berolinense, Berlin (B) 1 records from United States National Plant Germplasm System Collection 1 records from SER Site-based Surveys 1 records from Herbarium of Umeå University (UME) 1 records from Field Museum of Natural History (Botany) Seed Plant Collection 1 records from Löydös Open Finnish Observation Database 1 records from MISS_DC_01MAR2006 1 records from Species recordings from the Danish National portal Arter.dk 1 records from Botany Division, Yale Peabody Museum 1 records from Dr Mary Gillham Archive Project 1 records from Vascular Herbarium, NMBU 1 records from Pittsburg State University, Theodore M. Sperry Herbarium 1 records from University of Manitoba Herbarium (WIN) - Vascular Plant Collection 1 records from Hatikka.fi observations 1 records from Seed collection – dead seeds for evaluation and observation purposes 1 records from Merseyside BioBank (verified) 1 records from Herbier du Québec (QUE) - Collection de plantes vasculaires 1 records from University of Michigan Herbarium 1 records from PlutoF platform reference-based occurrences 1 records from Herbarium specimens of Université de Montpellier 2, Institut de Botanique (MPU)) 1 records from Sheffield and Rotherham Wildlife Trust - Records 1 records from Kenai National Wildlife Refuge, Alaska (KNWR) Plant specimens (Arctos) 1 records from Royal Ontario Museum Green Plant Herbarium (TRT) 1 records from North Merseyside Local Species Data (DEFRA Grant 23169) 1 records from University of Vermont, Pringle Herbarium 1 records from Merseyside BioBank (unverified) 1 records from Brock University Herbarium (BU) 1 records from Rutgers University, Chrysler Herbarium 1 records from SANT Herbarium vascular plants collection 1 records from University of Tennessee Vascular Herbarium 1 records from Depuración de la colección y base de datos del Herbario CICY. Fase IV 1 records from El banco de datos del Herbario HCIB en línea (Fase I): Implementación del Sistema Biótica 1 records from NEON Biorepository Terrestrial Plant Collection (Herbarium Vouchers) 1 records from Tallinn Botanic Garden 1 records from Hertfordshire Flora Survey Records 1987-2005 1 records from CONN 1 records from H.A. Stephens Herbarium 1 records from University of Lethbridge Herbarium (LEA) 1 records from Global Register of Introduced and Invasive Species - Alaska, United States 1 records from Observations.be - Non-native species occurrences in Wallonia, Belgium 1 records from North Carolina State University Vascular Plant Herbarium 2 records from The AAU Herbarium Database 2 records from CSIC-Real Jardín Botánico-Colección de Plantas Vasculares (MA) 2 records from Herbarium Senckenbergianum Görlitz (GLM) 2 records from MPM Milwaukee Public Museum Herbarium 2 records from Bell Museum plants 2 records from MHA Herbarium: collections of vascular plants 2 records from Michigan State University Herbarium Vascular Plants 2 records from Cumbria Non Native Invasive Species 2 records from University of New Mexico Herbarium 2 records from Agnes Marion Ayre Herbarium (NFLD) 2 records from Sistematización del Herbario Nacional Forestal Biól Luciano Vela Gálvez 2 records from Montana State University Billings 2 records from Geneva Herbarium – General Collection (G) 2 records from CANB AVH data 2 records from Vascular Plant Herbarium: Herbarium Generale 2 records from Plant collection Natuurmuseum Brabant, Tilburg 2 records from Inventario florístico de la familia Boraginaceae en México.
